name: Sega Flash Vol. 1
overview: Sega Flash Vol. 1 is the first demo disc in the Sega Flash series. It was released in 1996. Sega Flash Vol. 1 is thought to have been distributed exclusively with new Saturn consoles for a short period, unlike its successors which were distributed alongside magazines as well. Playable Demos included: Virtua Fighter 2 Baku Baku Animal Golden Axe: The Duel Panzer Dragoon Zwei Sega Rally Championship
